content: The key to making this fight as easy as possible is to break the Rhino's horn. You want to do this as quickly as possible, so we'd recommend going in with the Wandering Wight Spirit equipped. Speed is essential here, as you'll need to hit the Rhino head-on to break the horn.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rhino Watch Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Gold Armored Rhino'.
The content is as follows:
The key to making this fight as easy as possible is to break the Rhino's horn. You want to do this as quickly as possible, so we'd recommend going in with the Wandering Wight Spirit equipped. Speed is essential here, as you'll need to hit the Rhino head-on to break the horn.
